title: Game won't open after launcher log in
body: The launcher closes without any error messages I can see right after I log in, it accepts my credentials but then it just closes down.

replies.body: I am having the same issue. I tried going into Riot folder, config folder, opening game.cfg in notepad and checking the height and width of resolution, which matches my screen (1920*1080), because somewhere online someone says if the resolutions don't match then this may happen. However this is not the case for me so I am having the same problem as you as of right now. I just updated my client to 6.24 after many many months of not updating it if that matters.

There's a good chance that this is a connection problem.  More specifically, you're making it through the login server but the client disappearing might suggest that you're disconnecting from pvp.net.  My suggestion would be to to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if it helps!
